plot: This documentary detailing the early years of gay liberation in East Berlin was never shown when it was first made in 1976 due to government censorship. It was finally released in March 2004.
title: Auf der Suche nach dem Glück
plot_es: This documentary detailing the early years of gay liberation in East Berlin was never shown when it was first made in 1976 due to government censorship. It was finally released in March 2004.
original_name: Auf der Suche nach dem Glück
plot_en: This documentary detailing the early years of gay liberation in East Berlin was never shown when it was first made in 1976 due to government censorship. It was finally released in March 2004.
